reviewText: This is a cute movie, but it has the feeling of "been there, done that." Like a lot of Cinderella remakes, it follows the same general storyline of the original. This version is a good remake of those remakes, but doesn't really add anything original or exciting. If you want a movie to watch with your kids, this is a decent bet. But it loses a star for lack of originality.
I've enjoyed this movie, even though I'm an old grandma.  It's an up-to-date treatment of the old favorite.
